div.head: ¶ To the Christian and vnaffectionate Reader.
div.p:
THE Author was determined to prefixe before these treatises an Apology, wherin he declareth and defendeth certaine places specially chalenged in thē: which his defence, for certaine respectes he hath reserued to be imprinted with the Latine Copie (which by Gods grace, shall shortlye come
forth) and in the mean time referreth this, as it is, to the iudgement of the learned and vnpartiall Reader.
